content.detailedDescription: I'm an american expat living in jamaica.  i was taking photos of a cloud formation an hour and a half before sunset. i'm on the third floor veranda looking west over the caribean sea. after the first 3 photos i tried to zoom in and that pic didn't turn out so i zoomed back to normal and took 1 last picture thats the one these 3 shapes apeared in. i only observed what i saw in the picture i did not see it with the naked eye. the pictures explain the situation.
content.summary: 5 photos taken within 1 minute of each other photo 5 has 3 shapes in it. they don't apear in other photos.

content.detailedDescription: Walking out of grocery store. ten or more bright pulsating lights in odd pattern flew past at great speed. we have video if you want to contact us.
content.summary: 10 or more quick pulsating lights flying past.

content.detailedDescription: Orb light blinked on then started to come towards me stoped and went across the street to then disapear... each night if you take 30minutes just to look at the stars you are guarentied to spot anormalies..
content.summary: Orb light blinked on then started to come towards me stoped and went across the street to then disapear... each night if you take 30minutes just to look at the stars you are guarentied to spot anormalies..

content.detailedDescription: Hello mufon! sorry it took so long to report. i reported a siting on 9/14. it actually occurred on the evening of 9/13. i reported it after midnight, 9/13. i woke the next morning and my hands were numb from just below my elbows all the way down. i also got my period. it was a week early. felt pretty grumpy because unexpected bleeding has that effect on me. rode my bicycle home from work on 9/14. saw nothing. walked home from work on 9/15. i saw the drone just south of the intersection at kfc. it was cute. it had a slow, bright light that cycled from bright to fading out and back again. it was following above the sidewalk which was pretty amusing. i walked under it on the sidewalk. it's speed was a little faster than me. there were red and white lights underneath. other than the lights, i may have a poor perception of this thing. the light was pretty bright. it is difficult to see after night blindness from looking at the bright light. that was kind of interesting. i feel like i am reporting mufon to mufon. i like your toys. sky has been pretty busy last few days with planes and such. saw a shooting star tonight. finally! i've been out that late for a month now and that's my first one. happy about that. thank you to whomever took me seriously. a big thank you to you.
content.summary: Mufon drone after siting??

content.detailedDescription: I'm writing this for john who brought it to our attention during our meeting with the brevard astronomical society. i am the current president and john was our former president. we are amateur astronomers and astrophotographer's. he saw an object (gold) blinking in and out at 2:00 am, this morning. disappearing and reappearing in different locations between denab and polaris. at first he thought it was a aircraft but further observations convinced him it was not an terrestrial aircraft. it was zipping about and leaving a light trail. he observed it for approx. 10 minutes. he was using his binoculars. after our meeting tonight weds. 21st 2016, he called me all excited and he could see it again. i ran out with my binoculars but sadly rain clouds were in the way. also trees were obscuring the view. i live at best guess 10 miles away from him. he was giving a blow by blow description of what he was seeing. he got all excited and said there were two of them. then it became three and soon he saw three in a triangle shape (in formation) flying. i got a break in the clouds and did witness two objects streak. we witnessed aircraft enter the area. airline, cessna and lifeflight helicopter. infact he would see a airliner and tell me where the objects were in relation to the aircraft. then he said he could see twenty or thirty of them. i called fran our club secretary who lives in merritt island and asked her to take a look. after i helped her as to where to look from her house, she said she could see bouncing lights. then she said she could see a bunch of them. i asked her if they were flying like a normal aircraft and she said no. anyway the clouds came in and we all went into our houses. i've known john for many years. i've never heard him so excited. i want to go out again tomorrow night to see this but a bunch of us will be at fit for a lecture on the james web telescope. afterwards we might or make it a point to get together friday or saturday night to see if it happens again. during the event, we kept trying to figure out if it could be drones or aircraft, but it appears what was seen will not fit the questions we asked each other.
content.summary: First night 1 seen. tonight, dozens seen

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard of my house taking my new puppy out to go.. for some reason i felt compelled to look up and saw some rainbow like shapes i thought nothing much of it, took a look down at my pup then looked back up and saw a object that i can't describe more than i have already. i was able to take photos which i believe can tell it all.
content.summary: Rainbow haze (not a rocket trail) orb like with a bite out of the back dancing around

content.detailedDescription: I was stare gazing. after clouds passed behind them i took notice. they were a rumbas formation. i thought it was airplanes of helicopters. it stayed still and clouds passed behind them. i texted my mother, had a wtf moment. it just went poof. vanished.
content.summary: Stare like. brilliant. silent. very very odd. clouds went behind them

content.detailedDescription: At dusk, myself and my roomate had just walked out of our woods after a short small game hunting trip. our other roomate was standing in the driveway facing west just staring at something in the sky. we said "hey whats up?"..He just pointed at this classic black triangle tr-3b style craft without losing his focus on it. so at that moment i pulled my phone out to capture it on film or at least get a picture, but the craft wouldnt show up on my screen in the shot. almost like it was cloaked, but we could still see it with the naked eye. it was moving less than 100mph easily, it seemed as if it would just fall from the sky it was moving so slow. the altitude it was at is unknown because i dont know how large it was, but it seemed to be only a few hundred feet in the air and very big. it was so close i felt like i could reach out and touch it. it was loud like a airliner as it was coming at us, but was silent when it was above us, and had a quiet hum that almost made you want to vomit as it flew away to the east. none of us had any fear, we all swemed pretty calm, if not "amazed". it had small squared windows on the side, three red lights on the corners of the undercarriage, a big white light in the center of the undercarriage, and a vertically vented rear "thruster" area. there is always ufo activity out there, some at space altitudes, and some closer. but this was the only one weve ever been able to clearly make out what it was. surely other farmers and local saw the craft.
content.summary: Black triangle craft flew over our home very slowly at dusk. myself and 2 others witnessed the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
I'll start by saying my great grandfather left me a 11 acre wooded lot surrounded by corn fields in the middle of the country. well my friends and i grew up in a very small town of 3-4k people, so we didn't have much to do city wise. we would always be out there having bon fires, and just enjoying life.

one night we were having a bon fire, and just hanging out waiting to start a little party. one of my friends said look at all those planes flying about 5 miles out. they were coming from 3 different directions, and converging at a central location. we all thought this weird and chalked it up to helicopters looking for weed plants, and starting from there and spreading out.

well we started the fire and were getting the chairs from my barn, and just in general getting ready. i noticed that the crafts were seperating now heading on there own straight line paths moving rather slowly without deviation.

one of my buddies said they have to be looking for the weed crop, as it's popular for people to grow weed while the corn is at it's tallest. we were always told at night infrared picted up on it's heat signature at night.

one of the crafts is flying in a path that will take it directly over us, so we all stopped doing what we were doing and ran to my car to sit and watch incase we needed to drive off or something(teenagers give us a break).

as it appraches we could see 4 lights on it altogether. we still think it's a helicopter at this point. about 1/4 a mile out is when we could see the shape. it was a triangle and moving very slow on a distinct path. like it was traveling on a line with no flutter. as it gets closer i roll my window down and stick my head out for a better look. going no more than 20 miles per hour directly over the top of us was indeed a triangle craft with 3 whiteish lights on each end point, and what appeared to be a light in the center. it felt like eternity while it was going over us. no noise, just a very ominous feeling that we just saw a ufo.

after it had passed my friends did not say a word. i wanted to talk about it get their oppinions, but they were quite. just kept saying that is crazy, and i can't believe it. to this day they won't discuss what we saw. they just acknowledge that it happened. i believe the craft was man made, and doing a social experiment with the other 10 craft to gather reports of sitings. what other explanation could there be. i'll never forget that night.

i recently heard of this website, and knew i had to share.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: At my wooded land with 3 friends saw 10 or so  craft converge one flew over us slowly

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside approximately  9:30 pm on july 31, 2016 and i looked up and directly above me i noticed an orange light zigzagging very fast above the clouds then it was gone. i lthen looked to the north and saw a white light getting larger and coming closer. i observed it getting larger and larger until i could see that it was two lights like headlights on a car. the craft started to head southeast and it was close enough to me that i was able to see it was disc saucer shaped, had horizontal blue and white lights on it's side and as it glided past me it did not emit any sound or exhaust. there were horizontal oblong lights (a dimmer white) on the back, two rows, about 4 lights in each row and there was one row on the back top of the craft and one row on the bottom. i was able to see that the object was metallic by the moonlight reflecting off it's steel colored body. i continued to observe it until i had to climb on my steps to actually be able to see it because it was low and the house next to me obstructed my view. i could then see the headlights lighting up the treetops and then it left my field of vision. i should have run inside to get my cell phone to take a video/photo but i was too transixed on the object and i was trying to comprehend what i was seeing.
content.summary: Saw orange light above clouds zigzagging then saw bright white light getting larger coming towards me then craft

content.detailedDescription: Driving south on wesley chapel blvd. immediately noticed something strange in the sky. it was moving way too fast to be a cloud. looked carefully at it and it was around 200 feet or so from the ground and about 1000 feet away from me. it was probably around 100 feet in length or so. no idea on width. gun metal gray / carbon fiber color. blended in with the storm clouds coming towards us but it was moving west instead of north. smoothly coasted through the air, fast as a small cessna. no lights. didn't hear anything as i had my windows up. no electrical interference. only had 3-5 seconds to see it before it went over the trees.
content.summary: Dark like a rain cloud but shaped like a double-sided bullet

content.detailedDescription: Orb shape, transparent at times, others came & went. bright light without shadow.  then a lrgr one appeared gave off light even when no light was on
content.summary: Wasn't able to see with the naked eye only on camera i recorded it for 8 minutes.Then left

content.detailedDescription: Driving down the highway today i looked up to see a perfect tube, silver, reflective, fly in a straight line right across the visible sky, disappearing past the tree line. no clouds, blue sky so it really stood out. never seen a ufo before and this was amazing. how was it flying?? it was so cool, seemed to have flat ends so definitely a tube not a cigar. gave off no sound or smoke. i was totally in awe. i still can't believe it. this thing should not have been able to fly.
content.summary: While driving down clinton hwy i witnessed a silver tube, perfect tube no curves, large, fly in a straight path right in front of me.

content.detailedDescription:
around midnight on september 13, 2016 my father-in-law, wife, and myself were standing outside of my in-laws house in a small town of about 400.  there was no moon, no cloudy overcast, and the winds were calm.  as i turned to walk towards my car, i noticed a bright light at about 20 degrees above the horizon.  this would not be unusual where we were at because we live close to an international airport and are accustomed to seeing landing lights from aircraft entering and departing various traffic patterns. however, this light appeared to be stationary with no external navigational lights.  it also appeared to be whiter than most of the aircraft normally look. my family also noticed the light.  
     
     approx. 1-2 minutes later the light dimmed from very bright to about the same quality as a star.  it than began a near vertical ascent directly over our heads in what i would estimate was less than 10 seconds, where it was joined by two other objects of the same size and light quality.  the three objects were performing various maneuvers including tight circles, abrupt direction changes, and straight line flight.  the three objects became dimmer and dimmer as they tracked from directly overhead to the southwest where we lost sight of them.

     i had one similar incident approx. 1-2 weeks before that i dismissed to some unknown anomaly. the first incident occurred exactly the same way but there was only one object total that was observed.  it was also in the direction of the airport along a flight path used for aircraft approach.  however, it was again a very bright light similar to landing lights that went vertically to directly overhead.  

     i have also previously noticed an object with star like size and light quality that tracks from south to north crossing 3/4 of the sky in approx 20 seconds or less. i have attempted to research any satellites overhead on various satellite tracking website but have had no success find an object that passes overhead at that specific date and time.
content.summary: Bright light that went from 20 degrees above horizon to vertical and was joined with 2 other objects

content.detailedDescription: While walking in field a loud noise surrounded me and my husband. to our left it was translucent and it lifted out of the field making a loud noise like whomp  whomp  whomp . a mechanical noise. it came down to our right a green slime looking comet shaped ufo. it turned bright orange then bright white. it had a disc shaped head on it and it lit up the fields like the sun.  it transformed into a blood crescent moon and drifted diagonally into the moon's location.
content.summary: It lifted in field entity was translucent and making loud noise. came down in east as a green comet that turned orange then white then lit up both fields like daytime.  then it turned into a blood crescent moon

content.detailedDescription: My wife, mother in law and i were sitting looking at the lake (goose creek) watching boat lights cruise by no wake in the dark.  we were also looking for iridium flares and satellites in the dark sky in front of us and above.  my mother in law had a star phone app so we were looking at mars, saturn and antares to our left and trying to find the constellations. just to the left of mars 4 white stars in a square formation suddenly appeared.  i asked my mother in law what those were and her reply was "i don't know". just then they split in 4 different directions, 3 to the left and 1 to the right at very fast speed. these were still at satellite altitude or higher.
content.summary: Watching stars, four enterd vision in formation then split in 4 separate directions

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a concert at red butte gardens when my daughters boyfriend grabbed me and ran and we went near the right stage and looked up and saw this object in the sky the lights were dull i saw six equally spaced lights if you took eight lights spaced in a circle and took two away on opposite sides this is what i i saw i grabbed the phone and took some grainy shots but you can see the object. i assume it was very far away and huge. after it headed to 90 degrees we could not see it as the city lights either obstructed the view?
i then saw a fast moving object jet ? chase the in same direction.

the time was just after dark

some of the band members, security personnel, myself, and my daughters boyfriend saw this pretty incredible.
content.summary: Observed a 6 lighted object in sky very quiet huge

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on my way home when i saw 3 glowing objects. i had no clue what it was, nor did the cars in front of me. we all slowed down. i took out my phone and took pictures. the 3 turned into 1 and quickly disappeared when i got to the clearing. i did think it had to be ufo's as i had never seen anything remotely similar.
content.summary: I saw 3 glowing lights above road that turned into one and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This is a description of paranormal and most likely alien surveillance of me and my bedroom that occurred 2x within 2.5 days apart.  the first occurrence was while i was sleeping alone on wednesday night into thursday, november 5 at maybe 3 am.  my mother was home sleeping in a bedroom down the hall.  i awoke from a very bright light in my dark room (i sleep with blinds and curtains pulled and no night light) that was in the shape of a perfect rectangle about 6" x 9" (inches)filled with bright light and suspended in the air at the foot of my bed about 7 ft high.  it was moving left slowly until it reached my left wall and changed directions to trace the left wall and trim molding (ascended higher)toward me.  as it moved across my wall it disappeared as it reached the end of the wall, just 3 feet from me.  i had frozen and was probably only moving my eyeballs to observe it.  i was calm, rational, but fearful of what it could be. my first thought was that it was a alien surveillance camera as opposed to a spirit entity or portal.  i had been hearing eerie high pitches sounds at night while lying in bed for some time outside in my back yard.  i live in a brightly lit suburban neighborhood by the way, but since very young, i always feared aliens landing in my backyard!

3 days later saturday morning around 6 am, now sleeping with my young daughter.  i awoke and opened my eyes in time to see just 2 seconds later, a bright laser light rectangular outline, this time transparent inside, about 2 feet by 3 feet pop through the window, with pulled blinds and drawn curtain, closest to my side of the bed. the same window the illuminated smaller rectangle had ended its bedroom course 3 nights prior. this time i had another witness.  my 9 year old who was sleeping next to me was turned on her side and had opened her eyes the same time as me to witness the same event.  we both saw the large laser-like window or portal turn clockwise on its axis about 180 degrees until it faced us and then poof, disappeared into thin air. it's like it saw us, or maybe saw my daughter and immediately abandoned its mission. i've been terrified ever since that i avoided an abduction and that "it" or "they" might come back.  i've been sleeping with night lights or a bathroom or closet light on.  what's remarkable is that this happened 2x in the same week.  why my house, my bedroom?  my mother was not disturbed.  also, i immediately researched rectangular ufos and there was a sighting on november 5 about 35 miles away.  i have not found any evidence online of a similar large transparent portal in anyone's house. i have read about spirit portals but this is a little different in its shape, movement, and deliberate actions.
content.summary: The paranormal sighting occurred in my bedroom 2x within 2.5 days.  this is a description of the first event in the middle of the night when i awoke with a rectangle full of light suspended, moving in the air 7 ft high across from my bed.

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing as usual early morning before sunrise. i looked up and saw an oval shaped object flying from south to north at what seemed to be a pretty good rate of speed. i watched it for about 45 seconds before it disappeared into the clouds. this is actually the 4th time i have seen these type of objects. this one seemed to be either bigger or closer than the others. just after seeing this unknown object a plane passed overhead. i could plainly see the blinking lights and hear its engines. the object i saw before had no blinking anything and i made sure to note that there was no sound. i suppose it could have been a plane that was so high i could not hear it. but in the night sky, from my experience, you can usually see flashing lights. also, this object was all white and the light was bigger than the lights from an airplane. just a white glowing oval object.
content.summary: Bright oval shaped object, moving south to north, no blinking lights, no sound. plane in area right after, could hear it and could see blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: Dropping my wife off at work i decided to take a picture of the moon and realized that i had caught something in my picture that wasn't there to my eyes
content.summary: Couldn't see object with my eyes but my camera caught it

content.detailedDescription: Taking the dog out for a walk at topaz park in victoria bc and just saw a ufo. triangular. a perfect equilateral triangle. about 1000ft estimated altitude. 3 equally spaced apart amber coloured lights on the bottom. flew ne or nne almost right right over top the park facing finlayson st. very fast speed estimated 300-450km/hr. approximate "wingspan" was about that of a dh3 seaplane (that we have fly over head daily). completely silent. called victoria police to report it. i saw it for about 30 seconds before i lost sight of it behind tree's/houses. i was wearing velcro gloves at the time i was playing fetch with my dog so by the time i took out my phone, threw my glove, slid my camera open and slid to video mode to record a video it was nearly gone behind the houses and i only got 3 seconds on black sky. i'm literally still freaking out and can't believe i'm even writing this post. i'm also a marine engineer in the navy posted to cfb esquimalt. i know what i saw. and i have never in my life seen anything like that before. i'm still freaking out and can't sleep. i saw it at 0131 and was on the line with the local police by 0135.
content.summary: Black triangle 3 amber light ufo,

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gone tro bed and saw the moon throught the window. the moon was beautifully yellow and totally round. as i looked i suddely bekame awere that the moon changed colour.
it bekame more yellow and looked some larger. i went to my window and opened it so i schould hear any noise if it was a helikopter with a strong light towards me.
when the big light was, approximatly 2miles away from me , still on the strait direktion from the moon that now were hidden behind the ufo. i was stunned when i realised that 
"the big ball" came towards me without any noise at all. when the "ball" was about 600feet away i saw the edge on the upperside.
at all time when it descended  towards me it changed  colour: yellow - orange - green - orange - red.
the building has 16 floors and my family had the apartment on 11'sfloor.
when  the "thing" was about 150feet out from me it rolled and tipped over and showed me that it was flat.  it seems that  it was two saucer ,  one upside and one in bottom. 
they where 7-8feet apart by standing colored rectangular  windows/glass.
the  ufo stopped outside the building on it's edge probably on ground.
the upper edge was just above my floor.
until now i have been seeing the ufo about 5 min .   now it lifted some ten-twenty feet and began to change side and color.  it become a red pulsating round ball about ten feet in diam .
it moved south so i had to go to  my parents room and  waken up my father who also saw the red big ball.
the ball/globe moved south slowly in a wave motion, it "bounced " 3times and stopped over water about 3 - 4 miles away.
it stopped and began to vibrate and suddely came one more red pulsating ball.
the two bekame one and increased  the vibration/pulsating.
afterski ca: 15sec  did the red ball disappear very fast to the sky.

my father avsked me what was that!      i told him my thougths. 

the same year he saw two different occasions big cigarshaped ufo together with 
30-40 other persons.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Disklike ufo descending strait towards my bedroomswindow on 11's floor landed standing on it's  then took off as a red ball

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my kitchen table, that over looks a big bay window.  this was approximately 8.00 p.M.  there were these lights which had caught my eye.  they formed a triangle, there was a bright orange read light at the corner of each of them forming a triangle.  these triangles that were formed were big. the size, location, and what had appeared they were doing scared me.
they were floating, came down to the ground and appeared to be doing something, they were there for some time.  i had watched them for about 20 minutes. i stopped watching them and closed the curtains.  i felt that if i continued to watch them, that they would sense my presence there, even perhaps pick up on what i was thinking. at first i thought that a couple of semi trucks took a wrong turn and had to turn around on our property. as i kept watching i soon realized i was wrong.  i was stricken with fear and panic as i had watched what they were doing. i tried to calm myself, i was so worried that they would sense my presence being so close.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I had seen 2 triangles, 3 bright orange/red lights (1) on each corner of them.  back yard, appeared to be gathering something

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were walking to a parked car behind the big y parking lot. the parking lot has some lighting. i look to the sky and see a slightly larger than a star orange glowing orb. i ask my friend if she sees it. she does see it. she describes it like this: "you know those fireworks that have the embers that slowly fall to earth? it looked like one of those without the falling" the orb pulsated and flicked. it also moved a bit around the sky in a random pattern and didn't seem to be covering much distance. the it just went out. the event lasted about a minute. neither of us had been drinking.
content.summary: Orange pulsating orb

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dogs out in the morning and saw a bright light in the sky. the object was moving faster then most planes. there were no blinking safety lights or any sound associated with the object. i first noticed the light above the trees to the west when i started recording. the object slightly turned to the south why moving in the eastward direction when i lost it behind the trees. even after the object passed i noticed no blinking safety lights or any sound at all.
content.summary: Saw moving bright light in early morning sky while taking dogs out

content.detailedDescription: I was with my daughter and son on our back porch talking and enjoying the night air when we all saw this blue light appear in the ne over some trees, about 1/4 of a mile or less away. we watched and were wondering what it was, as it held a stationary position. all of a sudden it started moving, slowly bobbing back and forth then it changed color to a pinkish/purple then it would hover then move, then bob a bit then hover then it changed colors to orangish/reddish and it slowly descended into the tree line where we lost sight of it. a minute or two goes by then all of a sudden, further down (or east) the tree line a orange light ascends and hovers a a bit then has a flickering light that is red and then a silverish white. it looks as if it was maybe a plane to the everyday person but it was a glowing orange and it was such a strange hovering bobbing path it was going west on....And i've seen many many airplanes and they don't stop or bob or hover or glow orange. it was absolutely silent as well and a plane that close would of have some sort of noise. it continued slowly west until we were not able to see it from our place anymore. i took a few pictures when it first appeared and then my phone died. i attached what i have. i had just submitted a report last week of a pulsating orange light and this seems to be in the same vein. i have no idea. it was way to big to be a drone and went to far where a controller wouldn't be able to fly it....And i still don't believe either things were an airplane because i have been watching the airplanes for years. i feel excited and feel like my family is being watched in some way. we are all rh-negatives on both sides and have always had strange things happen. and i can't stop thinking the clouds are not what they seem and i watch them constantly as well. sometimes they just don't seem like a real cloud but something trying hard to appear that way.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: My daughter, son and i saw a blue light that was stationary then moved and changed colors.

content.detailedDescription:
As a current pilot, former airforce pilot, and an aerospace engineer/manager who holds a phd, i am a very reputable source.
my property looks down onto the puget sound (pacific) and at 4pm in the afternoon of tue 9/20 my wife & i witnessed two objects flying in formation south westerly from the area north east of everett (e.G. arlington, mt.Baker), over north western everett, hat island, whidbey island, continuing onto the pacific.
as i say, i'm a former airforce pilot, so i am exceptional at identifying aircraft - these two were not aircraft per se.  the two were flying in close formation at approximately 6,000-8,000ft, at a constant altitude, at approximately 700-1,000mph.  i was looking from the side up at approximately 20 degrees.  they were either cylindrical or disc shaped, but due the shallow angle (and speed) i could not tell precisely, but were not cylindrical or triangular.  they had no lights, and were a silver/grey metal in the clear afternoon sky.
objects flying at such speed without any audible sound on a calm afternoon 'caught my eye' the most.
content.summary: Pair of objects flying in formation at high speed (700-1,000mph) heading w-sw

content.detailedDescription: I was in oregone with my friend mike an we were siting in a kaboose inthe middle of nowhere cause we were hobo`s at the time an we would catch freighttrains up an down the coast anyway we were in a kaboose an we were faceing south an we were on the backside of the kaboose mike was on the leftside faceingsouth an i was on the rightside of the kaboose an i looked out the window an this v shape boomarang like shape was flying very slow withred lights on the bottom of it from the back end of it to the front on bothsides of it an it was flying from northwest to southeast an i said mike take a look at this theres something flying in the sky mike said its a plane  i said no mike its not makeing any noise he said its a glider no its got on it then ya its a glider then it flew over the kaboose an then it was gone.
content.summary: A v shape with red lights on the bottom going from both ends going to the point

content.detailedDescription:
I worked as policeofficer, and that night, we got the order to go to a trafficaccident in the cold snowy night.
we were told that à bus have had a inpacd with a car.
when we arrived to the place were the accident were supposed to have taken place we met a woman. about 35-40 years old.
the woman pointed at her car, a "wv beetle", that stod against the left wall.
she said: the bus that came towards me forcera me to stear my car to the left in the wall 
and then the bus disappered.

i avsked her what colour did the bus have.And she answered :
i don't know, i was totalt dassled of the strong beam in my eyes .
the light /as she called bus/ disappered

we serched for tracks fr.O.M. the "bus" but there were no. tracks at all exeptionella fron the womans own car.

she pointed along the road and said: the bus came with the strong light and i had to stear into the wall to avlid a collision
i avsked did the bus pass you.
she answered:idon't knew the strong light/ beam went out/disappered.

suddenly she said loudly: there it is and pointed to a thing flying abort 30-40 meters above us 
it had a strong beam in the front and  abort 6 rectangular "windows" along the side. 
it looked like a "small zepperlinare orättvis cigar.  abort 25-30 meters length and  3 meters thick. it had a low sound like an old fichingboat.
it seemed to be grey metallic and the windows were lighten.
it passé us  slowly in a speed of app. 15-20 mph
when it had passéd us and we did not se the lights the sound faded out and it diappered.
